author: Olivia Harvey
title: Dream job alert: This company wants you to travel Europe and Instagram stunning shots for them
text:
Dream job alert: This company wants you to travel Europe and Instagram stunning shots for them We’re definitely not telling you to quit your job. But, if you’re looking for a change of scenery (in more ways than one), then we have a stunning offer for you. According to Cosmopolitan , a company called Busabout wants you to travel to Europe and Instagram pictures for them. Um, hello? This is too good to be true, right? Wrong — this is real.
Busabout is looking for a brand ambassador and a video producer to spend five months in Europe . We’re talking Paris, Switzerland, Spain, etc. Plus, flights, accommodation, and other travel costs will be covered by the company.
You’ll even get an allowance for food purchases! This could be you! We're looking for two travel addicts to vlog, 'gram, Snap & blog their way across Europe on the trip of a lifetime. All expenses paid! Link in bio. #busabout 
A post shared by Busabout (@busabouteurope) on Feb 21, 2017 at 3:00am PST 
The company aims to help the independent traveller hit the best cities and destinations in Europe and Asia while getting the most bang for their buck. Traveling on the Busabout “Hop-On, Hop-Off” network allows you to stay independent while also still being able to rely on a system that will get you to where you need to go.
Chances are Cinque Terre will steal your heart away. Better pack an extra one just in case. #busabout 
A post shared by Busabout (@busabouteurope) on Feb 9, 2017 at 2:36am PST 
So, if you’re dying to become a Busabout brand ambassador, all you have to do is submit a three-minute video via YouTube telling the company about yourself and your favorite place. Then, show off your Instagram skills with an Instagram post tagged with #busaboutambassador and @busabouteurope.
Can't argue with this view of Kotor from St. John Fortress. Montenegro is quite the hidden gem! Incredible by @duey_spargo from our Balkan Trek! #busabout 
A post shared by Busabout (@busabouteurope) on Jan 17, 2017 at 1:46am PST 
Or, if video producing is more your vibe, submit a two-minute YouTube video showcasing your location and editing skills and provide Busabout with a list of your gear and software. Easy peasy!
Don't leave Venice without a visit to the nearby tiny island of Burano. It's the cutest thing! #busabout 
A post shared by Busabout (@busabouteurope) on Jan 9, 2017 at 3:03am PST 
Convince your travel-obsessed (18+) friend to apply with you and note in your application that you two are a team. Renew those passports, and make sure you have a clear schedule from April through September. You might be on the brink of getting your ultimate dream job so don’t let anything get in your way!
You can read up on all the details of the job and more about the company on Busabout’s website. The application deadline is March 5th, so get cracking! You won’t want to pass up this opportunity.
